content: 188 sts at each front and purl the next back note you may place markers of a different colour check yoke depth or type from the raglan markers either side of the garter panels to help keep you on track work in pattern no further increases continuing round 1 kfb knit to 2 sts before raglan marker garter panels until yoke measures at least 3 25 kfb k1 sm 4 times 8 sts increase - 2 sts per section 3 75 4 25 4 5 5 5 5 6 6 5 7 7 7 25 7 75 8 8 25 round 2 knit to garter panel purl garter panel 8 75 9 9 5 10 10 5 deep measured from the knit to marker sm knit to marker sm twice bottom of the ribbing or from the cast-on where ribbing has not yet been worked at the front of work rounds 1-2 a total of 10 12 13 13 14 15 the sweater 18 20 21 23 23 25 28 25 29 29 26 28 30 times this is 20 24 26 26 28 30 36 40 42 46 short row shaping optional 46 50 56 50 58 58 52 56 60 rounds 164 184 200 212 228 248 268 292 308 328 optional short row are worked symmetrically 336 360 384 364 400 416 400 428 460 total sts around the centre back they lift the back neckline relative to the front for a slightly 34 38 40 42 44 48 54 60 62 66 66 72 78 74 better fit but are not required while short-row 82 82 78 82 86 sts at each sleeve instructions are given for all sizes we prefer to 48 54 60 64 70 76 80 86 92 98 102 108 114 skip them for kids under 6 so the garment can be 108 118 126 122 132 144 sts at each front and worn either way back we use german short row here however you 0-6 mo to l proceed to check yoke depth can substitute your preferred short-row method xl xxl 3xl 4xl 5xl 6xl double the stitch on ws with yarn on the ws round 3 kfb knit to 2 sts before raglan marker slip 1 stitch purlwise pass the yarn over the kfb k1 sm 4 times 8 sts increase - 2 sts per section needle to the rs then back between the needle tips back to the ws this doubled stitch now round 4 kfb knit to garter panel purl garter appears as 2 loops over the needle and you are panel knit to 2 sts before raglan marker kfb k1 ready to purl sm kfb knit to 2 sts before raglan marker kfb k1 sm twice 8 sts increase - 2 sts per section double the stitch on rs bring the yarn between the needle tips to the rs then slip 1 stitch work rounds 3-4 a total of 2 2 4 6 6 6 times purlwise
